  1. import os
  2. import json
  3. from ftplib import FTP
  4. import tempfile
  5. import time
  6. from celery import task, current_task
  8. from ftp_deploy.conf import *
  9. from ftp_deploy.models import Log, Task
  10. from .core import LockError
  11. from .repo import commits_parser, repository_parser
  12. from .ftp import ftp_connection
  13. from .email import notification_success, notification_fail
  14. from .curl import curl_connection
  17. class Deploy(object):
  19. """Deploy method responsible for perform deploying"""
  21. def __init__(self, host, payload, service, task_name):
  22. self.host = host
  23. self.service = service
  24. self.task = Task.objects.get(name=task_name)
  25. self.data = json.loads(payload)
  26. self.json_string = payload
  27. self.files_count = commits_parser(self.data['commits'], self.service.repo_source).files_count()
  29. self.ftp_host = self.service.ftp_host
  30. self.ftp_username = self.service.ftp_username
  31. self.ftp_password = self.service.ftp_password
  32. self.ftp_path = self.service.ftp_path
  34. self.repo = repository_parser(self.data, self.service)
  35. self.repo_username, self.repo_password = self.repo.credentials()
  36. self.user = self.repo.deploy_name()
  38. def perform(self):
  39. """Perform ftp connection and choose repository perform method (bitbucket or github)"""
  41. if self.user == 'Restore':
  42. self.service.get_logs_tree().delete()
  44. self.log = Log()
  45. self.log.payload = self.json_string
  46. self.log.service = self.service
  47. self.log.save()
  50. try:
  51. self.ftp = ftp_connection(self.ftp_host, self.ftp_username, self.ftp_password, self.ftp_path)
  53. if self.service.lock():
  54. raise LockError()
  56. self.task.active = True
  57. self.task.save()
  59. self.ftp.connect()
  61. except LockError, e:
  62. self.set_fail('Service Locked', e)
  63. except Exception, e:
  64. self.set_fail('FTP Connection', e)
  65. else:
  66. try:
  67. if self.service.repo_source == 'bb':
  68. self.perform_bitbucket()
  70. if self.service.repo_source == 'gh':
  71. self.perform_github()
  73. except Exception, e:
  74. self.set_fail(self.user, e)
  75. else:
  76. self.log.user = self.user
  77. self.log.status = True
  78. self.log.save()
  79. notification_success(self.host, self.service, self.json_string)
  81. finally:
  82. self.ftp.quit()
  83. self.service.check()
  84. self.service.save()
  85. self.task.delete()
  87. def perform_bitbucket(self):
  88. """perform bitbucket deploy"""
  89. curl = curl_connection(self.repo_username, self.repo_password)
  90. curl.authenticate()
  91. i = 0
  92. for commit in self.data['commits']:
  93. for files in commit['files']:
  94. file_path = files['file']
  96. self.update_progress(i, file_path)
  97. i += 1
  99. if files['type'] == 'removed':
  100. self.ftp.remove_file(file_path)
  101. else:
  102. url = 'https://api.bitbucket.org/1.0/repositories%sraw/%s/%s' % (self.data['repository']['absolute_url'], commit['node'], file_path)
  103. url = str(url.encode('utf-8'))
  105. value = curl.perform(url)
  106. self.create_file(file_path, value)
  108. curl.close()
  110. def perform_github(self):
  111. curl = curl_connection(self.repo_username, self.repo_password)
  112. curl.authenticate()
  113. i = 0
  115. for commit in self.data['commits']:
  117. for file in commit['removed']:
  118. self.update_progress(i, file)
  119. i += 1
  121. self.ftp.remove_file(file)
  123. for file in commit['added'] + commit['modified']:
  124. self.update_progress(i, file)
  125. i += 1
  127. url = 'https://raw.github.com/%s/%s/%s/%s' % (self.data['repository']['owner']['name'], self.data['repository']['name'], commit['id'], file)
  128. url = str(url.encode('utf-8'))
  129. value = curl.perform(url)
  130. self.create_file(file, value)
  132. curl.close()
  134. def update_progress(self, i, file_path):
  135. progress_percent = int(100 * float(i) / float(self.files_count))
  136. current_task.update_state(state='PROGRESS', meta={'status': progress_percent, 'file': os.path.basename(file_path)})
  138. def create_file(self, file_path, value):
  139. temp_file = tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile(delete=False)
  140. temp_file.write(value)
  141. temp_file.close()
  142. temp_file = open(temp_file.name, 'rb')
  144. self.ftp.make_dirs(file_path)
  145. self.ftp.create_file(file_path, temp_file)
  147. temp_file.close()
  148. os.unlink(temp_file.name)
  150. def set_fail(self, user, message):
  151. self.log.user = user
  152. self.log.status_message = message
  153. self.log.status = False
  154. self.log.save()
  155. notification_fail(self.host, self.service, self.json_string, message)
